attributes.action: School Leavers without a job should join the Army
attributes.additional_details: School Levers who can not find a job within 12 months should be signed up to the Army for 3 years.  This will provide more tax-payers and less benefit claimants.  This will provide school leavers with an idea of commitment to work and has a wide variety of jobs.   They can provide for themselves and their families. This will also get people out of the gang culture and will give them goals to achieve in life.
